concept.title: Search for a Saved Search or Collection with Spaces in the Name.

section.p: When searching for a Saved Search or Collection with a name that contains spaces, you must enclose the Saved Search or Collection name in double quotes. For example:
section.codeblock: select MeContext from search "saved search with spaces"
section.p: When an entire search query is wrapped in double quotes, this will attempt to return a Collection with a name matching the query.
If a Collection is not found it will attempt to return a Saved Search.
If neither a Collection or a Saved Search is found, the query will be parsed as a normal search query.
